alert.note: Alert for Angelina; Nacogdoches; Sabine; San Augustine; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 5:40PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Nacogdoches, southwestern Shelby, central Angelina, San Augustine and west central Sabine Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 540 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Etoile, or 13 miles east of Lufkin, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lufkin, Hudson, Huntington, Melrose, Woden, Macune, Etoile, Martinsville, Chireno, Broaddus, Denning, Shawnee, Clawson, Central, Bronson, Redland, Homer and Chinaquapin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Angelina; Nacogdoches; Sabine; San Augustine; Shelby
